org.apache.ignite.ml.math

Class Blas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.Blas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Blas
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Useful subset of BLAS operations. This class is based on 'BLAS' class from Apache Spark MLlib.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      y := alpha * A * x + beta * y.

      • scal

        public static void scal(Double a,
                        Vector x)
        Performs in-place multiplication of vector x by a real scalar a. (x = a * x)
        Parameters:
        a - Scalar a.
        x - Vector x.

      • spr

        public static void spr(Double alpha,
                       DenseVector v,
                       DenseVector u)
        Adds alpha * v * v.t to a matrix in-place. This is the same as BLAS's ?SPR.
        Parameters:
        u - the upper triangular part of the matrix in a [[DenseVector]](column major)

      • spr

        public static void spr(Double alpha,
                       SparseVector v,

      • gemm

        public static void gemm(double alpha,
                        Matrix a,
                        Matrix b,
                        double beta,
                        Matrix c)
        For the moment we have no flags indicating if matrix is transposed or not. Therefore all dgemm parameters for transposition are equal to 'N'.

      • gemv

        public static void gemv(double alpha,
                        Matrix a,
                        Vector x,
                        double beta,
                        Vector y)
        y := alpha * A * x + beta * y.
        Parameters:
        alpha - Alpha.
        a - Matrix a.
        x - Vector x.
        beta - Beta.
        y - Vector y.

      • checkCardinality

        public static void checkCardinality(Matrix a,
                                    Vector v)
                             throws CardinalityException
        Checks if Matrix A can be multiplied by vector v, if not CardinalityException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        a - Matrix A.
        v - Vector v.
        Throws:
        CardinalityException
